feed.title: Tangerine UI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Tangerine UI: v1.9.2
entry.content:
Some visual cleanup.

  • Improved look for search result sections
  • Improved look for hashtag page headers
  • Improved look for hashtag buttons below posts.

entry.title: New release for Tangerine UI: v1.9.3
entry.content:
• Fixed: missing borders in the Explore tab
  • Fixed: misaligned private mention icon in some places
  • Fixed: poll icon color didn't match the other icons in the compose form in dark mode.
  • Fixed: muted text in poll notifications wasn't properly styled

entry.title: New release for Tangerine UI: v1.9.4
entry.content:
• Smaller translate button
  • Now using a darker color value for profile fields in dark mode
  • Darker column backgrounds in dark mode
  • Better contrast for thread lines and hashtag buttons in dark mode
  • Fixed: Search suggestion popout was clipped on mobile

entry.title: New release for Tangerine UI: v1.9.5
entry.content:
üî® Fixed:

  • Added a workaround to prevent the bottom toolbar from overlapping with the system UI on iOS when Mastodon is added to the Home Screen.

entry.title: New release for Tangerine UI: v2.0
entry.content:
‚ú≥Ô∏è New

  • New theme variant: Cherry üçí
  • New theme variant: Lagoon üê†
  • Tangerine UI has been redesigned from the ground up
  • The theme now features the great Phosphor icon family.
  • Custom icons for popular hashtags: popular hashtags on Mastodon are now displayed with custom icons in the Explore tab, in search results, as well as on profile pages in the featured hashtag section.
  • This is working off a small dictionary of popular hashtag keywords.
  • Custom icons are not intended to cover all hashtags. This is only meant to apply to a selection of the most popular and regularly trending hashtags on Mastodon.
  • Hashtags that don't have a custom icon fall back to a regular tag icon.
  • More details and screenshots in this thread: https://nileane.fr/@nileane/112009497738808810
  • Redesigned polls (https://nileane.fr/@nileane/111643467739699856)
  • Even more compact mobile header: the header is now reduced to a single line, as opposed to the usual double-height header. (https://nileane.fr/@nileane/111949277787178116)
  • Floating Compose button: on small screens, the compose button is now located in the bottom right hand corner, above the bottom navigation toolbar.
  • Redesigned fullscreen media viewer.
  • Redesigned Content Warnings and Filtered posts
  • Redesigned pinned posts
  • Pinned posts on profile pages are now visually separated from the timeline of most recent posts.
  • Added support for the advanced web interface (multi-column layout)
  • Added support for account hover cards
  • Added support for author bylines in link cards
  • Added support for grouped notifications
  • Added support for the new Compose field
  • Added support for the new Mute and Block dialogs
  • Added support for the new "What's in a handle?" dialog on profile pages
  • Added support for the new inline "Who to follow" recommendations in the timeline
  • Added support for the new "Filtered Notifications" panel
  • Added a Tangerine UI meta footer: Tangerine UI's version number and variant name are now displayed alongside Mastodon's version number in the web app footer.
  • Added support for the new profile section in the onboarding panel

‚ú® And more

Tangerine UI v2.0 features many more small improvements, fixes, and redesigned UI elements.
Feel free to explore them all!

‚ö†Ô∏è Compatibility

Tangerine UI v2.0 is only compatible with Mastodon instances running Mastodon v4.3 and above. If your Mastodon instance hasn't been updated to v4.3, please keep using Tangerine UI Legacy instead.

This major release is the result of several months of work.
If you love and use Tangerine UI, feel free to support me on Ko-fi. ‚ù§Ô∏è
